hero.subText1: I design and build websites and applications.
hero.subText3: Turning your vision into a stunning reality.

about.title: About Me
about.name: I'm Ahsan Imam Khan,
about.p1: a passionate B.Tech Computer Science student at MIT-WPU, Pune. My journey in the world of technology is driven by a deep-seated curiosity and a desire to solve real-world problems. I enjoy the process of turning complex ideas into simple, beautiful, and intuitive software solutions. Whether it's building a responsive website or developing a full-fledged web application, I'm always up for a challenge.
about.p2: Beyond the code, I am a firm believer in continuous learning. The tech landscape is ever-evolving, and I make it a point to stay updated with the latest trends and technologies. This constant pursuit of knowledge not only sharpens my skills but also allows me to bring fresh and innovative perspectives to the projects I work on. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to team up with like-minded individuals to create something truly impactful.
about.p3: When I'm not glued to my screen, you might find me exploring new coding tutorials, contributing to open-source projects, or brainstorming my next big idea. I am driven by the belief that technology can make a meaningful difference, and I am excited to be a part of that change.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: I'm open to discussing new projects and freelance opportunities. Feel free to get in touch!

chatbot.title: Ahsan's AI Assistant
chatbot.greeting: Hi! I'm Ahsan's AI assistant. Ask me anything about his skills, projects, or how to get in touch. How can I help you?
